response.overview: It has been one year since the events of Spider-Man 2018. You now play as Miles Morales. A 17 year old trying to find his place in his new home Harlem. A group known as the Underground causes chaos around the city. Miles must learn how to keep his secret safe and learn how to be himself.
response.title: Spider-Man: Miles Morales

results.name: Marvel's Spider Man: Miles Morales - Official World Premiere Announcement Trailer
